Package frogger

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
frogger.Actor
frogger.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Animal
extends Actor
Create the Animal object frogger which is controlled by the user in the game The frogger will get points in the game while moving forward The goal is to reach all the Ends The frogger may die due to car crash or sunk in water

  • Property Summary

    image of frogger in jumping state

    size of image of the Animal object which has the value of 40

    initial x-coordinate of Animal object which has the value of 300.0

    initial y-coordinate of Animal object which has the value of 706.4666665999999

    water platform that is intersecting

    y-axis movement distance in pixels which has the value of 26.6666666

    checking if the Animal object is in not moving state

    points given when the Animal object reaches the End which has the value of 50.0

    points obtained by the Animal object

    checking if the Animal object is in the middle of animation

    the furthest point of Animal object have reached so far
